details.name: The perfect Large Screen Display mobile for you!

The Infinix Smart 4 is made of a polycarbonate body with a simple and stylish finish. It comes in dynamic gradient colors and the back cover features a single color with light variations. It has a waterdrop notch housing the front-facing selfie of 5mp ff with a flashlight and at the back is the rear 8MP AF with a dual flashlight.
In terms of display, it has a 6.6” HD+ TFT display with a 720*1600 resolution. The display is a full view with tiny bezels and chin.
The smart 4 runs on Android 9 Pie Go edition based on Infinix’s custom XOS UI. It is powered by a MediaTek chipset clocking at a 2.0GHz quad-core speed.
In terms of memory, it has 1GB RAM and 16GB internal memory which is expandable up to 64GB via the micro SD card slot.

For selfies, there is a 5MP camera with LED-flashlight. At the back of the smartphone is a dual 8MP camera with a dual-LED flashlight. The camera is AI-enabled and comes with a PDAF autofocus function as well as an F/1.8 aperture for taking good shots.

The device has a non-removable Lithium-ion 4000mAh battery capacity with no fast-charge technology on its Micro USB port. On normal usage, Infinix claims the battery lasts up to 4 days without the need for a recharge.

details.name: The Infinix Smart 5 has a stylish gem-cut-design that creates subtle patterns . The panel is similar to the one on Infinix Hot 9 series and Tecno Spark 5 housing the cameras and fingerprint reader.

It also has a fingerprint scanner and it measures 165.4 x 73.4 x 8.75mm in dimensions. The waterdrop notch on the front houses a 6.6-inch LCD display that offers 720 x 1600 pixels resolution and 20:9 aspect ratio.
The screen has an 86.6% screen-to-body ratio offering a broader view experience.

There is an 8 MP snapper on the waterdrop notch that features automatic retouching to deliver perfect photos. It also has a dual flash for nice shots in dim light. You will get a new intelligent algorithm to customize your own beauty style such as 3D face improvement and identifies different skin tones to make selfie photos more natural and unique.

The Smart 5 is further equipped with triple rear cameras on the back. It includes an enhanced AI-powered 8MP triple camera that captures clearer, brighter, and more beautiful photos effortlessly at all times.

On hardware, the maker equipped the Smart 5 with a midrange Mediatek MT676ID processor that has an octa-core clocking at a speed of 1.8 GHz. It runs on Go Edition based on the Android 10 operating system out of the box.

The internal storage includes an average of 32GB and 2GB RAM.You can further expand the phone using a micro SDcard up to 64GB. The Infinix Smart 5 packs a 5000 mAh battery that Infinix claims will last up to 4 days. It has a standard version of 10W charging through micro USB cable.

The Android 9 Pie operating system gives you access to several apps and widgets, a 16GB ROM is enough storage for your pictures, videos, and apps while its 4000 mAh battery lasts several hours of heavy use.
Get the Infinix Smart 4 4G smartphone online from Jumia at the best price in Nigeria.

Android 9 Pie Operating SystemYou've got access to a host of applications and games with the pre-installed Android operating system, so do great things confidently! The Android 9 Pie packs in all the tools that make for smart multitasking and a seamless interface between tasks.
Save Everything StorageWho knew a machine this slim could store so much? The Infinix Smart 4 has an internal memory of 16GB which can be expanded via a microSD card.
Extended Battery LifeA longer lasting battery means more time outside and more time on the go. The mAh 4000 battery ensures your productivity is not restricted by fast power depletion.

name: Infinix Note 8i 64GB ROM 4GB RAM 6.78'' HD 5200mAh Battery Android10 Tranquil Blue

details.name: Infinix Note 8 and Note 8i have been launched by the Shenzhen-based company at a virtual event. Both models come with quad rear cameras and are powered by MediaTek Helio G80 SoC. The Infinix Note 8 and Note 8i also feature a hd+ infinity-o display, with the Note 8 featuring dual selfie cameras. For an enhanced audio experience, the Infinix Note 8 and Note 8i come with DTS Audio processing. The Infinix Note 8 also comes with dual speakers to deliver stereo audio. The dual-SIM (Nano) Infinix Note 8i runs on Android TM10 and features a 6.78-inch HD+ (720×1,640 pixels) IPS display with a 20.5:9 aspect ratio. The phone is powered by the MediaTek Helio G80 SoC, paired with 6GB of RAM. It comes with the quad rear camera setup that includes a 48-megapixel primary sensor, 2-megapixel macro shooter, 2-megapixel depth sensor, and an AI lens. For selfies, the Note 8i offers a single 8-megapixel camera sensor at the front, along with dual LED flash. Infinix has given 128GB of onboard storage that is expandable via microSD card (up to 256GB) through a dedicated slot. Connectivity options include 4G LTE, Wi-Fi 802.11ac, Bluetooth, GPS/ A-GPS, USB Type-C, and a 3.5mm headphone jack. Sensors on board include an accelerometer, ambient light, magnetometer, and a proximity sensor. There is also a side-mounted fingerprint sensor.The Infinix Note 8i includes a 5,200mAh battery that supports 18W fast charging. Lastly, the phone measures 171.4×77.7×8.9mm.

details.name: infinix hot 8 x650b smartphone comes with a 6.52-inch touchscreen display with a good resolution . It is powered by a 2GHz octa-core MediaTek Helio P22 processor. It comes with 2GB of RAM. The Infinix Hot 8 runs Android Pie and is powered by a 5,000mAh battery.

As far as the cameras are concerned, the infinix hot 8 x650b on the rear packs a 13-megapixel primary camera with an f/1,8 aperture and a second 2-megapixel camera. The rear camera setup has phase detection autofocus. It sports an 8-megapixel camera on the front for selfies, with an f/2.0 aperture.

The infinix hot 8 x650b runs XOS 5.0 based on Android Pie and packs 32GB of inbuilt storage that can be expanded via microSD card (up to 256GB) with a dedicated slot. The Infinix Hot 8 is a dual-SIM smartphone that accepts Nano-SIM and Nano-SIM cards.

Connectivity options on the Infinix Hot 8 include Wi-Fi, GPS, Bluetooth v5.00, USB OTG, Micro-USB, and FM radio. Sensors on the phone include accelerometer, ambient light sensor, compass/ magnetometer, proximity sensor, and fingerprint sensor. The Infinix Hot 8 supports face unlock.

Enpowered and better with a Sleek out look,Expanded Memory,better Picture Quality and a Larger Screen to crown it all, are the qualities of the newly launched Hot 8 lite by Infinix.The inifinx hot 8 lite gives you opportunity to connect for less with an amazingbattery which stays for days, giving you more time to stream movies from Netflix,listen to your favorite artist and game with your friends all on one phone. There are two other versions of the hot 8; one with octa-core Helio P22 CPU, and the other with Quad- core CPU, and both of them has support for 4G LTE network. But the Hot 8 Lite on the other hand, has a Quad-core MT6580P CPU, and does not have support for 4G LTE network.

details.name: Cinematic Display For Better Viewing

Enjoy the mobile cinema experiences with the 6.82" larger Cinematic display. The 20.5:9 full view ratio is closer to the IMax movie ratio, enable you to an immersive entertainment experience in movie, gaming and streaming.
6000mAh Ultra Battery For Unlimited Fun

HOT 9 PLAY packs with an ultra battery capacity of 6000mAh to power it. Its stylish design with only 8.90mm thickness brings your unique personality to the next level despite the 6000mAh ultra battery capacity. You can now truly enjoy unlimited fun anytime, anywhere!
Battery Lab Smart in power-saving
Enjoy the longer using experiences with the help of the smart power-savingsystem - Battery Lab. It is a unique AI power optimization system that improves overall standby time by approximately 15%.
Battery's lifecycle Enhanced

We have improved the battery quality for HOT 9 Play by enhancing 60% battery lifecycle for a longer durability. A longer battery lifecycle means lesser consumption in resources and every improvement is carefully designed and made for Infinix HOT 9 Play users.
A New Sound Experience by DTS Sound

Thanks to DTS audio processing technology, you can level up the sound effect to entertain yourself more. Customize your personalized sound effects to enjoy better sound quality experiences in movies, music, and gaming at any time.
Secure your information
Secure all the information in your device by locking your device via fingerprint and face unlock technology.
A Faster Octa-Core Processor

HOT 9, the new generation of HOT series, has enhanced the processor upgrade from Quad-core to Octa-core, providing you with better performance to handle your movies, apps, browsing, and more with ease.
An Optimized Operating System

The new XOS 6 comes embedded askin on the latest android 10 (has been built on top of android 10). Android 10 is an iteration of Android 9. It comes loaded with better features and is faster, convenient and more efficient.

details.name: The Infinix Smart 5 has a stylish gem-cut-design that creates subtle patterns . The panel is similar to the one on Infinix Hot 9 series and Tecno Spark 5 housing the cameras and fingerprint reader.

It also has a fingerprint scanner and it measures 165.4 x 73.4 x 8.75mm in dimensions. The waterdrop notch on the front houses a 6.6-inch LCD display that offers 720 x 1600 pixels resolution and 20:9 aspect ratio.
The screen has an 86.6% screen-to-body ratio offering a broader view experience.

There is an 8 MP snapper on the waterdrop notch that features automatic retouching to deliver perfect photos. It also has a dual flash for nice shots in dim light. You will get a new intelligent algorithm to customize your own beauty style such as 3D face improvement and identifies different skin tones to make selfie photos more natural and unique.

The Smart 5 is further equipped with triple rear cameras on the back. It includes an enhanced AI-powered 8MP triple camera that captures clearer, brighter, and more beautiful photos effortlessly at all times.

On hardware, the maker equipped the Smart 5 with a midrange Mediatek processor that has an octa-core clocking at a speed of 1.8 GHz. It runs on Go Edition based on the Android 10 operating system out of the box.

The internal storage includes an average of 32GB and 2GB RAM.You can further expand the phone using a micro SDcard up to 64GB. The Infinix Smart 5 packs a 5000 mAh battery that Infinix claims will last up to 4 days. It has a standard version of 10W charging through micro USB cable.

details.name: Infinix Note 8 and Note 8i have been launched by the Shenzhen-based company at a virtual event. Both models come with quad rear cameras and are powered by MediaTek Helio G80 SoC. The Infinix Note 8 and Note 8i also feature a hd+ infinity-o display, with the Note 8 featuring dual selfie cameras. For an enhanced audio experience, the Infinix Note 8 and Note 8i come with DTS Audio processing. The Infinix Note 8 also comes with dual speakers to deliver stereo audio. The dual-SIM (Nano) Infinix Note 8i runs on Android TM10 and features a 6.78-inch HD+ (720×1,640 pixels) IPS display with a 20.5:9 aspect ratio. The phone is powered by the MediaTek Helio G80 SoC, paired with 6GB of RAM. It comes with the quad rear camera setup that includes a 48-megapixel primary sensor, 2-megapixel macro shooter, 2-megapixel depth sensor, and an AI lens. For selfies, the Note 8i offers a single 8-megapixel camera sensor at the front, along with dual LED flash. Infinix has given 128GB of onboard storage that is expandable via microSD card (up to 256GB) through a dedicated slot. Connectivity options include 4G LTE, Wi-Fi 802.11ac, Bluetooth, GPS/ A-GPS, USB Type-C, and a 3.5mm headphone jack. Sensors on board include an accelerometer, ambient light, magnetometer, and a proximity sensor. There is also a side-mounted fingerprint sensor.The Infinix Note 8i includes a 5,200mAh battery that supports 18W fast charging. Lastly, the phone measures 171.4×77.7×8.9mm.

name: Infinix Hot 9 6.6-inch IPS Display, Android 10.0; XOS 6.0, 16MP + 2MP + 2MP + QVGA Quad Rear Cameras, 3GB Ram 64GB Rom

details.name: The Infinix Hot 9 features one of the most better-looking design upgrades we have seen in the Hot 9 series. Compare it with that of the Infinix Hot 8 and you immediately notice a very refined design, one that tries it best to fit into the latest trend.

The rear of the Infinix Hot 9 features curved edges and a glossy finish with a mild gradation in color. This rear panel is home to a capacitive fingerprint sensor, a quad-camera setup and the Infinix logo, which indicates its an Infinix phone.

Upfront, we have set up that resembles that of the Infinix S5. It’s a 6.6-inch IPS LCD display housing a single camera cut-out. This display has a screen resolution of 720 x 1600 pixels and a screen density of 269 PPI.
Infinix included a beefier camera system in the Hot series this year. They managed to squeeze in quad rear cameras in here, which allowed for more camera features.

The primary camera sensor varies according to the storage variants you purchase. variants below 64GB will have a 13MP primary camera, while variants with 64GB and above will have a 16MP primary camera. Other cameras included in this quad-camera setup include a 2MP macro camera, a 2MP depth camera and a QVGA camera which helps in taking photos in low light conditions.

This camera setup is supported by a triple LED flash and is capable of shooting photos in HDR, Panorama, and videos maxed at 1080p @ 30fps. for selfies, it makes use of an 8MP shooter, which is capable of shooting photos and also shoot videos maxed at 1080p 30fps.

The Infinix Hot 9 follows suit with its predecessor. It doesn’t deviate from the category other smartphones in Hot series featured. Performance-wise, you have got a smartphone that isn’t capable of tackling power-intensive tasks.
Inside this Android phone is an Octa-core Mediatek MT6762 Helio P22 processor, a PowerVR GE8320 graphics processing unit and a non-removable 5000mAh battery.
On the software side, the Infinix Hot 9 runs the XOS 6.0 interface on top of the Android 10.0 operating system.
The Infinix Hot 9 features a 3.5mm headphone jack, a version 2.0 Micro-USB port, dual-band wifi, Bluetooth 5.0.
Internet connectivity on the Infinix Hot 9 is capped at 4G LTE. which means downloads and streaming will be capped at 4G speeds.

details.name: Cinematic Display For Better Viewing

Enjoy the mobile cinema experiences with the 6.82" larger Cinematic display. The 20.5:9 full view ratio is closer to the IMax movie ratio, enable you to an immersive entertainment experience in movie, gaming and streaming.
6000mAh Ultra Battery For Unlimited Fun

HOT 9 PLAY packs with an ultra battery capacity of 6000mAh to power it. Its stylish design with only 8.90mm thickness brings your unique personality to the next level despite the 6000mAh ultra battery capacity. You can now truly enjoy unlimited fun anytime, anywhere!
Battery Lab Smart in power-saving
Enjoy the longer using experiences with the help of the smart power-savingsystem - Battery Lab. It is a unique AI power optimization system that improves overall standby time by approximately 15%.
Battery's lifecycle Enhanced

We have improved the battery quality for HOT 9 Play by enhancing 60% battery lifecycle for a longer durability. A longer battery lifecycle means lesser consumption in resources and every improvement is carefully designed and made for Infinix HOT 9 Play users.
A New Sound Experience by DTS Sound

Thanks to DTS audio processing technology, you can level up the sound effect to entertain yourself more. Customize your personalized sound effects to enjoy better sound quality experiences in movies, music, and gaming at any time.
Secure your information
Secure all the information in your device by locking your device via fingerprint and face unlock technology.
A Faster Octa-Core Processor

HOT 9, the new generation of HOT series, has enhanced the processor upgrade from Quad-core to Octa-core, providing you with better performance to handle your movies, apps, browsing, and more with ease.
An Optimized Operating System

The new XOS 6 comes embedded askin on the latest android 10 (has been built on top of android 10). Android 10 is an iteration of Android 9. It comes loaded with better features and is faster, convenient and more efficient.

name: Infinix Zero 6 X620B- 64gb Rom, 6gb Ram, Qualcomm Snapdragon 660, 4g Lte, Fingerprint- Blush Gold

details.name: Infinix Zero 6 is an update to the Zero 5 flagship smartphone that was released last year by Infinix Mobility. The Zero 6 will be the company's 2018 flagship and packs most of the trending features we've seen in the year. Most noteworthy, is the bezel-less display with a notch at the top.

Enough of the display for a bit, the new Zero 6 has a full Metal body, houses the Snapdragon 660 with an octa-core processor. There's a 6GB RAM space and 64GB storage space, dual rear camera and a massive battery capacity. Without further ado, meet the Infinix Zero 6.

The Zero 6 sports a Metal overall unibody that's non-removable. It has curved sides and edges that brings out the beauty of the device pretty nicely. At the top left corner, we can see the dual rear shooters and LED flash in a horizontal position.

The fingerprint scanner isn't going anywhere, it sits comfortably at its usual position and unlocks the device in 0.1s. Turning over to the sides, we can see the volume keys and power button as it measures 7.7mm in thickness. It will be available in Gold, Black and Silver colors, there's no Red this time around.

The trending top-notch display flooded the 2018 Mobile World Congress and other companies followed suit almost immediately. Infinix didn't want to be left behind, as the Zero 6 comes with the notch as well. The company also managed to keep the bottom bezel at a low.

Focusing on the screen, the 6.2-inch FHD+ IPS LCD capacitive touchscreen is breathtaking. Boasting of 1440 X 2560 pixels in resolution and 535 pixel per inch density, making the details on the screen really crisp and sharp. It stretches up to 87% screen to body ratio and dishes out a 19:9 aspect ratio.

Running the race here, is the Snapdragon 660 from Qualcomm with Octa-core processor and 64-bit CPU architecture. The 8-Cores of processor here reaches an impressive clock speed of 2.2GHz with 14nm process technology. While the Adreno 512 graphics processor handles graphics.

There's a 6GB of RAM available here for multitasking with over 1GHz memory speed. In terms of storage, the device is 64GB strong, which is ready to accommodate all your apps and files, you can easily upgrade up to 256GB as well. The Infinix Zero 6 runs on Android 8.1 Oreo out of the box with XOS 3.0 Hummingbird.

The dual 12MP + 24MP rear shooters capture quality photographs. The cameras has 2x optical zoom, portrait mode, 2x Axis, Phase Detection & Laser Autofocus, there's a Dual-LED dual tone flash as well. Record videos of 2160 pixels at 30fps, while the 20MP selfie camera supports Face ID and takes cute selfies.

Powering the Infinix Zero 6 is a 3570 mAh non-removable Li-Po battery with fast charging technology. With the fast charging feature, it shouldn't take up to 2.2 hours to fully charge up the battery from 0% to 100%.

details.name: The Infinix Note 7 revamps the Infinix Note series, in an attempt to bring back the spotlight the Infinix Note 6 may have expelled. In summary, you have got a more classy design, improved cameras, a bigger battery and lots more. To further buttress this point, we explore the Infinix Note 7
The Infinix Note 7 without a doubt features the best chassis design on any smartphone in the Infinix Note series. It is unarguably one of the best-looking Infinix smartphones.
Despite note been built with premium materials, you have got a design that could pass as befitting for a mid-range flagship smartphone.
On the rear, you have got a combo of a gradient design and a psychedelic color pattern that emits different colors based on how it’s tilted.
You also get a circular camera bump housing quad cameras and beneath is the Infinix Note moniker, which indicates that its an Infinix smartphone from the Note series.
Upfront, you have got a 6.95 inch IPS LCD display with a hole punch camera cut-out. This display has a screen resolution of 720 x 1640

The Infinix Note 7 specs sheet reveals a camera that shows substantial upgrades from its predecessors. For starters, it features a quad-camera system on the rear, as opposed to the triple camera on its predecessor.
Its quad-camera system is home to a 48MP primary camera, a 2MP macro camera, a 2MP depth camera and another 2MP camera, which is a dedicated video camera.
This camera setup is capable of taking photos in HDR, Panorama and also shoot videos capped at 1080p at 30fps. Expect good quality photography capability with improved low light performance.
The Infinix Note 7 features a 3.5mm headphone jack, a version 2.0 Micro-USB port, dual-band wifi, Bluetooth 5.0.
Internet connectivity on the Infinix Note 7 is capped at 4G LTE. which means downloads and streaming will be capped at 4G speeds.

details.name: Infinix Note 7 is officially released in April 2020.
The smartphone comes with a plastic body with a quad rear camera. The device is incorporated with Mediatek Helio G70 Octa-core processor and Mali-G52 2EEMC2 GPU.
The smartphone comes in various colors and a big screen that has a 6.95inches HD+ INFINITY Ocapacitive touchscreen, resolution of 720 x 1640 pixels.

The Infinix Note 7 is fueled with a non-removable 5000 mAh battery. The smartphone runs on the Android 10 + XOS 6.0 operating system with the user interface. The phone handles Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by).

The smartphone features quad camera that consists of 48 M/AF (wide) + 2 MP (macro) + 2 MP (depth) + QVGA with Quad-LED flash, panorama, HDR. The front camera consists of 16MP (wide). The device is integrated with a loudspeaker and a 3.5mm jack. The smartphone features Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, hotspot, Bluetooth 5.0, GPS/GNSS Radio, and USB.
The sensors include Fingerprint (side-mounted), accelerometer, proximity, and compass.

details.name: Powerful screen Never so colorful

NOTE4 Pro has the newest Sharp 5.7” display feature with high color gamut - reaching 85% NTSC, which is 20% higher than most competing smartphones. With a 1300 (TBD) contrast rate and luminance, exceeding 500cd/m2 which together makes the screen unbelievably colourful, clear and dynamic.
Astonishing Xpen
NOTE4 Pro offers an astonishing XPen to bring a totally new experience. Using Air command, you can customize XPen shortcuts anytime.

Record moments and ideas in Memo, even in sleep mode, and explore your creative side in XNote. With NOTE4 Pro and XPen even you can become a painter! Meanwhile, Xpen works 40 mins with only 20 seconds charging.
8MP + 13MP Powerful camera

NOTE4 Pro has the power to capture all your best moments clearly with an excellent 13MP main camera and Dual-color LED flash. The 1.4μm 8MP front camera combines the latest selfie filters to make all of your selfies truly stunning.
Great user experience

The powerful NOTE4 Pro octacore chipset gives the best experiences in gaming, streaming, or surfing the internet. 3GB RAM delivers enjoyable and smooth performance, and up-to 128GB external memory provide excellent overall user experience.
Elegant metal design

The NOTE series is always blazing the trail in design. This time, NOTE4 Pro gives boasts a full metal unibody design with the most comfortable handling experience. The antenna and sound bar have both been designed for and overall elegance and unified aesthetic.
5 min charge, 250 min talk

The NOTE4 Pro has an improved charging experience with the latest Xcharge 4.0 technology and large 4500mAh battery. It comes with 5V5A low-voltage DC charging technology which increases charging efficiency to 96%, compared to the 88% in NOTE3. In addition, a quick 30-minute charge swiftly replenishes the battery of your NOTE4 Pro to give you enough power for the day. The Xcharge 4.0 reduces the loss of current conversion and reduces heat from charging to provide better overall efficiency and safety.
Fast charge evolution

The DNA of the Infinix NOTE series comprises of a large screen, big battery, and flash charging. Following the innovations of three generations of the NOTE evolution, NOTE4 Pro is an embodiment of perfection. NOTE4 Pro offers the newest technology: Xcharge 4.0 which provides quick charge with low voltage and high efficiency.
New released XOS 2.2

The NOTE4 Pro user experience offers many new and interesting features based on Android N. It has the Multi-Windows which means you can simultaneously process two applications using a split-screen view. Also, the NOTE4 Pro introduces an upgraded Fingerprint function that adds viewing of photo libraries, voice recording, and customizing quick opening of apps via different finger input.

details.name: The Infinix Smart 4 is made of a polycarbonate body with a simple and stylish finish. It comes in dynamic gradient colours and the back cover features a single colour with light variations. It has a waterdrop notch housing the front-facing selfie of 5mp ff with flash light and at the back is the rear 8MP AF with dual flashlight.
In terms of display, it has a 6.6” HD+ TFT display with a 720*1600 resolution. The display is a full view with tiny bezels and chin.
The smart 4 runs on Android 9 pie Go edition based on Infinix’s custom XOS UI. It is powered by a MediaTek chipset clocking at a 2.0GHz quad-core speed.
In terms of memory, it has a 1GB RAM and a 16GB internal memory which is expandable up to 64GB via the micro SD card slot.

For selfies, there is an 5MP camera with LED-flashlight. At the back of the smartphone is a dual 8MP camera with dual-LED flashlight. The camera is AI-enabled and comes with PDAF autofocus function as well as an F/1.8 aperture for taking good shots.

The device has a non-removable Lithium-ion 4000mAh battery capacity with no fast-charge technology on its Micro USB port. On normal usage, Infinix claims the battery lasts up to 4 days without the need for a recharge.

details.name: The Infinix Smart 5 has a stylish gem-cut-design that creates subtle patterns . The panel is similar to the one on Infinix Hot 9 series and Tecno Spark 5 housing the cameras and fingerprint reader.

It also has a fingerprint scanner and it measures 165.4 x 73.4 x 8.75mm in dimensions. The waterdrop notch on the front houses a 6.6-inch LCD display that offers 720 x 1600 pixels resolution and 20:9 aspect ratio.
The screen has an 86.6% screen-to-body ratio offering a broader view experience.

There is an 8 MP snapper on the waterdrop notch that features automatic retouching to deliver perfect photos. It also has a dual flash for nice shots in dim light. You will get a new intelligent algorithm to customize your own beauty style such as 3D face improvement and identifies different skin tones to make selfie photos more natural and unique.

The Smart 5 is further equipped with triple rear cameras on the back. It includes an enhanced AI-powered 8MP triple camera that captures clearer, brighter, and more beautiful photos effortlessly at all times.

On hardware, the maker equipped the Smart 5 with a midrange Mediatek processor that has an octa-core clocking at a speed of 1.8 GHz. It runs on Go Edition based on the Android 10 operating system out of the box.

The internal storage includes an average of 32GB and 2GB RAM.You can further expand the phone using a micro SDcard up to 64GB. The Infinix Smart 5 packs a 5000 mAh battery that Infinix claims will last up to 4 days. It has a standard version of 10W charging through micro USB cable.

When compared to the last year flagship, it is likely to get lots of improvement. It may now support 4K video capability and also features portrait mode. Additionally, to keep the display on, it is equipped with 4500a mAh battery with fast charge technology support. The device can easily last for an entire day with a single charge. The fast charge technology can charge the device within just two hours.

A pop-up camera which I think will be the main talking point about this device just like the Tecno Camon 15 Device. But, there are other amazing features this device has and these specs are just impressive.

For example, The device is using a MediaTek Helio P35 chipset is not the newest chipset from MediaTek but having this chipset on this device will make this device faster in processing files and makes it faster than the predecessors.

Also, there is a wide 6.53 inch IPS LCD display on the Infinix S5 Pro which has a 1080 x 2340 resolution and a 403 PPI at a 19.5:19 aspect ratio. There is no cut out on this display, Not even notch which means there is an immersive view on the device.

details.name: The Infinix Smart 4 is made of a polycarbonate body with a simple and stylish finish. It comes in dynamic gradient colours and the back cover features a single colour with light variations. It has a waterdrop notch housing the front-facing selfie of 5mp ff with flash light and at the back is the rear 8MP AF with dual flashlight.
In terms of display, it has a 6.6” HD+ TFT display with a 720*1600 resolution. The display is a full view with tiny bezels and chin.
The smart 4 runs on Android 9 pie Go edition based on Infinix’s custom XOS UI. It is powered by a MediaTek chipset clocking at a 2.0GHz quad-core speed.
In terms of memory, it has a 1GB RAM and a 16GB internal memory which is expandable up to 64GB via the micro SD card slot.

For selfies, there is an 5MP camera with LED-flashlight. At the back of the smartphone is a dual 8MP camera with dual-LED flashlight. The camera is AI-enabled and comes with PDAF autofocus function as well as an F/1.8 aperture for taking good shots.

The device has a non-removable Lithium-ion 4000mAh battery capacity with no fast-charge technology on its Micro USB port. On normal usage, Infinix claims the battery lasts up to 4 days without the need for a recharge.

details.name: This new device is an upgrade to the Hot 7 released a few months ago. The phone looks sleek in design with ample battery capacity that ensures you get long-lasting power. Let us check out what features Infinix is bringing on board this time and the price in Nigeria.

In terms of display, the new Infinix Hot 8 sports a 6.6-inch IPS LCD display with a screen resolution of 720 x 1600 pixels .The phone offers an impressive viewing experience with the waterdrop housing the selfie camera, and the bezel-less finish gives it a premium look. Sadly, the display is not HD which may pose as a turn off for some users.

Camera-wise, Hot 8 is equipped with a triple rear camera setup vertically stacked up. The camera module contains a 13MP main camera, 2MP depth sensor, and a dedicated low-light sensor, which can take clean and clear pictures. There is also a LED flash. At the front, you get an 8MP camera, capable of shooting crisp clear selfie pictures.

Infinix Hot 8 drives its juice from the sufficient 5,000mAh li-ion battery capacity. Although, this is below what Tecno Pouvoir 3 Plus packs, but guarantees a long-time power supply.here is also a 4GB RAM that ensures users get painless multitasking and gaming. For storage, there is 64GB internal storage that can be expanded upto 256GB via microSD card. Based on software, we have Infinix XOS 5.0 skin on Android 9 Pie.

details.name: Infinix Hot 9
Controlled Power Consumption

Battery Lab adopting AI intelligence in the Infinix Hot 9 helps optimize power conservation without compromising user experience. Its operation entails continual learning of a user's habit, the apps they spend most time in, and thereby through collaborative sensors and CPU, execute an intelligent power saving strategy, creating a 10% increase in overall standby time.
Optimized Capturing for Gorgeous Images

Capture beautiful images with more details for the distance and depth thanks to the 8MP dual rear camera with a Quad Flash. The infused new AI software technology enhances the overall beauty of the resultant images. The camera come enhanced with the PDAF autofocus function with an F1.8 aperture.
Extended Entertainment All Day Long

An upgraded battery of Non-removable 5000 mAh battery capacity provides an almost endless entertainment all day long, from streaming of movies and music to capturing the best moments and sceneries for up to 4 days without the need for a recharge.Spend 3 hours charging to enjoy up to 4 days battery life for an almost infinite entertainment. Infinix S5 is packed with a 4GB RAM combined with 64GB ROM for maximum storage capacity. The storage can be expanded using a micro SD card, the device treats you to a Octa-core 2.0 GHz Cortex-A53 , MediaTek Helio P22 processor.

The S5 device comes with an impressive Quad-camera setup on the back – sporting a 16MP main sensor, 5MP ultrawide, 2MP depth, and a qvga low-light sensor. The 5MP unit also lets you take macro shots of objects from as close as 2.5cm. Not just that, you can also record macro videos using the 5MP camera.

For selfies, Infinix S5 uses a 32MP front camera that has its own LED flash as well. The front camera of the S5 also comes with a face unlock system while on the back is a fingerprint scanner for more convenient unlocking of the device and adequate security features.Infinix S5 is available in two different elegant colors; Quetzal Cyan, Midnight Black and Violet, a non-removable 4000 mAh battery is kept under the hood to keep the power going and the battery supports fast charging.

name: Infinix SMART 4 X653,1GB RAM 16GB ROM, 4G LTE, 6.6'', 4000 MAh, 8MP+DUAL FLASH, FINGERPRINT Midnight Black

details.name: The Infinix Smart 4 is made of a polycarbonate body with a simple and stylish finish. It comes in dynamic gradient colours and the back cover features a single colour with light variations. It has a waterdrop notch housing the front-facing selfie of 5mp ff with flash light and at the back is the rear 8MP AF with dual flashlight.
In terms of display, it has a 6.6” HD+ TFT display with a 720*1600 resolution. The display is a full view with tiny bezels and chin.
The smart 4 runs on Android 9 pie Go edition based on Infinix’s custom XOS UI. It is powered by a MediaTek chipset clocking at a 2.0GHz quad-core speed.
In terms of memory, it has a 1GB RAM and a 16GB internal memory which is expandable up to 64GB via the micro SD card slot.

For selfies, there is an 5MP camera with LED-flashlight. At the back of the smartphone is a dual 8MP camera with dual-LED flashlight. The camera is AI-enabled and comes with PDAF autofocus function as well as an F/1.8 aperture for taking good shots.

The device has a non-removable Lithium-ion 4000mAh battery capacity with no fast-charge technology on its Micro USB port. On normal usage, Infinix claims the battery lasts up to 4 days without the need for a recharge.

details.name: Empowered and better with a Sleek outlook, Expanded Memory, better Picture Quality and a Larger Screen to crown it all, are the qualities of the newly launched Hot 8 lite by Infinix. The inifinx hot 8 lite gives you the opportunity to connect for less with an amazing battery which stays for days, giving you more time to stream movies from Netflix, listen to your favorite artist and game with your friends all on one phone. There are two other versions of the hot 8; one with octa-core Helio P22 CPU, and the other with Quad-core Helio A22 CPU, and both of them have support for 4G LTE network. But the Hot 8 Lite, on the other hand, has a Quad-core MT6580P CPU, and does not have support for 4G LTE network.
